#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t,n,r,c;
	long long ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>r;
		c=n-r;
		if(r<c)
		c=r;
		ans=1;
		for(int i=0;i<c;i++)
		ans=ans*(n-i)/(i+1);
		cout<<ans<<"\n";		
	}
}
